titles: The Bishop of Winchester's vindication of himself from divers false, scandalous and injurious reflexions made upon him by Mr. Richard Baxter in several of his writings ...
author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.
Morley, George, 1597-1684. Bishop of Worcester's letter to a friend for vindication of himself from Mr. Baxter's calumny.
publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Joanna Brome,
notes: "The Bishop of Worcester's letter to a friend for vindication of himself from Mr. Baxter's calumny" is a reprint of the letter of 1662, and has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
